QuestData.Title: Filthy Mongrels
QuestData.Description:
Those flea-bitten Hyena Mongrels the gnolls breed have got to go! Not only do they have no manners at all--you would not believe the places I've seen them relieve themselves--but they may very well be able to sniff me out despite my exemplary illusions.
Do the well-mannered world a favor and remove them from it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Hyena Matriarchs and $2oa Hyena Mongrels.
QuestData.CompletionText: Why, no I'm not a "dog person." Why do you ask?
